thread.title: A fab Birthday stay
thread.title_full: A fab Birthday stay - Review of Premier Inn London Brixton Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Roshcatz
title: A fab Birthday stay
text: Stayed 1 night with my boyfriend for my Birthday earlier in March after reading good reviews on here. Pleased to say we had a really lovely, warm and comfortable stay. Room was great, staff were really helpful and friendly and location was excellent, right in reach of local pubs/bars and Brixton market and Academy only down the road. Would definitely stay here again.
